required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: First-in-Human Study of Orally Administered GS-441524 for COVID-19
clinical_study.official_title: First-in-Human Evaluation of the Safety, Tolerability, and Pharmacokinetics of Orally Administered GS-441524 in a Healthy Human Volunteer

brief_summary.textblock: This is a two-part study is to evaluate the multi-day safety, tolerability, and pharmacokinetics (PK) of orally administered GS-441524 in a healthy human volunteer.

detailed_description.textblock: Part 1: 750 mg GS-441524 administered once daily (QD) for 7 days. Part 2: 750 mg GS-441524 administered three times daily (TID) for 3 days.

primary_outcome.description: Treatment-related AEs are defined as significant changes to blood chemistry (CBC, CMP) or 6-lead ECG.

secondary_outcome.measure: Pharmacokinetic (PK) Parameter: AUC0-24h of GS-441524 in Parts 1 and 2.
secondary_outcome.description: AUC0-24h is defined as the concentration of drug over time between time 0 to time 24 hours.

secondary_outcome.measure: PK Parameter: AUClast of GS-441524 in Parts 1 and 2.
secondary_outcome.description: AUClast is defined as the concentration of drug from time zero to the last observable concentration.

secondary_outcome.measure: PK Parameter: T1/2 of GS-441524 in Parts 1 and 2.
secondary_outcome.description: T/2 is defined as the estimate of the terminal elimination half-life of the drug

secondary_outcome.measure: PK Parameter: Cmax of GS-441524 in Parts 1 and 2.
secondary_outcome.description: Cmax is defined as the maximum observed concentration of drug.

secondary_outcome.measure: PK Parameter: Tmax of GS-441524 in Parts 1 and 2.
secondary_outcome.description: Tmax is defined as the time (observed time point) of Cmax.

secondary_outcome.measure: PK Parameter: Clast of GS-441524 in Parts 1 and 2.
secondary_outcome.description: Clast is defined as the last observable concentration of drug.

secondary_outcome.measure: PK Parameter: Tlast of GS-441524 in Parts 1 and 2.
secondary_outcome.description: Tlast is defined as the time (observed time point) of Clast.

secondary_outcome.measure: PK Parameter: AUCtau of GS-441524 in Parts 1 and 2.
secondary_outcome.description: AUCtau is defined as concentration of drug over time (the area under the concentration verses time curve over the dosing interval).

arm_group.description: 750 mg GS-441524 administered QD for 7 days
750 mg GS-441524 administered TID for 3 days

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Willing and able to provide written informed consent
- Negative pregnancy test at screening and prior to dosing
- Minimum body weight of 50 kg and body mass index (BMI) of 18-32 kg/m2
Exclusion Criteria:
- Use of other investigational drugs within 28 days of dosing
- Positive pregnancy test
- Abuse of alcohol or drugs
- Other clinically significant medical conditions or laboratory abnormalities

reference.citation: Humeniuk R, Mathias A, Cao H, Osinusi A, Shen G, Chng E, Ling J, Vu A, German P. Safety, Tolerability, and Pharmacokinetics of Remdesivir, An Antiviral for Treatment of COVID-19, in Healthy Subjects. Clin Transl Sci. 2020 Sep;13(5):896-906. doi: 10.1111/cts.12840. Epub 2020 Aug 5.

Tempestilli M, Caputi P, Avataneo V, Notari S, Forini O, Scorzolini L, Marchioni L, Ascoli Bartoli T, Castilletti C, Lalle E, Capobianchi MR, Nicastri E, D'Avolio A, Ippolito G, Agrati C; COVID 19 INMI Study Group. Pharmacokinetics of remdesivir and GS-441524 in two critically ill patients who recovered from COVID-19. J Antimicrob Chemother. 2020 Oct 1;75(10):2977-2980. doi: 10.1093/jac/dkaa239.

Davis MR, Pham CU, Cies JJ. Remdesivir and GS-441524 plasma concentrations in patients with end-stage renal disease on haemodialysis. J Antimicrob Chemother. 2021 Feb 11;76(3):822-825. doi: 10.1093/jac/dkaa472.

Yan VC, Muller FL. Advantages of the Parent Nucleoside GS-441524 over Remdesivir for Covid-19 Treatment. ACS Med Chem Lett. 2020 Jun 23;11(7):1361-1366. doi: 10.1021/acsmedchemlett.0c00316. eCollection 2020 Jul 9.

study_doc.doc_comment: Supplementary Table 1: Blood chemistry (CBC, CMP) results. Supplementary Table 2: Plasma concentrations of GS-441524 at indicated timepoints.
